card.name: Skysword, the Savage Vizier
card.text: ■ Multi ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then add the top card of your deck to your shields face down.

card.name: Wind Axe, the Warrior Savage
card.text: ■ Multi ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker." Then put the top card of your deck into your mana zone.

card.name: Miraculous Plague
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Choose 2 of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. Your opponent chooses one of them, puts it into his hand, and destroys the other one. Then choose 2 cards in your opponent's mana zone. Your opponent chooses one of them, puts it into his hand, and puts the other one into his graveyard.

card.name: Death Phoenix, Avatar of Doom
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Vortex evolution—Put on one of your Zombie Dragons and one of your Fire Birds. ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts that shield into his graveyard instead. ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, your opponent discards his hand.

card.name: Dorballom, Lord of Demons
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Demon Commands. ■ Triple Breaker ■ When you put this creature, destroy all creatures except darkness creatures. Then each player puts all non-darkness cards in their mana zone into their graveyard.

card.name: Tempest Baby
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw up to 2 cards. Then put the same number of cards on top of your deck in any order.

card.name: Olgate, Nightmare Samurai
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever one of your creatures is destroyed, you may untap this creature.

card.name: Bolmeteus Musha Dragon

card.name: Inferno Sign

card.name: Supernova Apollonus Dragerion
card.text: ■ Galaxy Vortex evolution—Put on top of 3 of your Dragons. ■ Triple Breaker ■ Meteorburn—Whenever this creature attacks, you may put a card under this creature into your graveyard. If you do, this creature gets "power attacker +15000" and "World breaker". ■ Whenever your opponent chooses this creature, put all cards in their mana zone into their graveyard.

card.name: Bolshack NEX
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a card that has Lupia in its Card Name ■ This creature has "power attacker +1000" for each Fire Bird in your graveyard.

card.name: Necrodragon Guljeneraid
card.text: ■ Whenever one of your Dragons other than '''Necrodragon Guljeneraid''' is destroyed, if this creature is in your graveyard, you may return this creature to the battle zone. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Necrodragon Dobolzack
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a God or Phoenix from it, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When this creature battles, after the battle, destroy it.

card.name: Black Lucifer, Sorcerer of Darkness
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, put the top 5 cards of your deck into your graveyard. ■ This creature gets +1000 power for each Demon Command in your graveyard. ■ Double Breaker ■ When this creature would be destroyed, you may return a Demon Command evolution creature from your graveyard to your hand instead.

card.name: Perfect Galaxy, Immortality Elemental
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Shield Force

card.name: Dragon Gear - Zangeki Mach Armor
card.text: ■ Cross Gear Effect ■ While this card isn't crossed with a creature, your Dragon and Samurai creatures may each cost 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1. ■ While this card is crossed with a Dragon or Samurai creature, each of your Dragon and Samurai creatures in the battle zone gets +2000 power and "speed attacker". ■ This card may be crossed with "tooltip

card.name: Astral Reef
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Cyber Viruses. ■ When you put this creature, you may draw 3 cards.

card.name: Streaming Shaper
card.text: ■ Reveal the top 4 cards of your deck. Put all water cards from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Mach Lupia

card.name: Dark Lupia
card.text: ■ Whenever one of your Dragons are destroyed, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures.

card.name: Cutie Heart
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 2 or fewer shields, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. ■ While you have 2 or fewer shields, this creature gets +4000 power and can't be blocked.

card.name: Hogan Blaster

card.name: Bolshack Lupia

card.name: All Delete
card.text: ■ Each player puts all their cards in the battle zone, hand, shield zone and graveyard into their deck and shuffles it.
